means: 撒（某物）于（某物之表面），洒，喷撒

sentence.Network_en: Men in green army uniforms are sprinkled throughout the huge auditorium.
sentence.Network_cn: 穿着绿色军服的人星星点点地分布在整个大礼堂中。

sentence.Network_en: She sprinkled pepper on my grub, watching me nosh.
sentence.Network_cn: 她在我的食物上撒了点胡椒粉，看着我吃。

sentence.Network_en: Cheese can be sprinkled on egg or vegetable dishes.
sentence.Network_cn: 奶酪可以撒在鸡蛋或蔬菜做的菜肴上。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Her face is sprinkled with tiny freckles ., 她的脸上有点点的雀斑.
drop cookies sprinkled with granulated sugar ., 表面撒有糖粒的球形小甜饼.
The water of cleansing has not been sprinkled on him , and he is unclean ., 除污秽的水没有洒在他身上 , 他是不洁净的.
They sprinkled pesticide to bug the potatoes ., 他们喷撒杀虫剂给马铃薯除虫.

list.abs: surface soil 表土surface sprinkling 表面喷洒surface tension 表面张力
石油英语词汇(S6)--石油百科 ... sprinkling basin 喷水池 sprinkling filter 滴滤池 sprinkling truck 洒水车.
sprinkler-sweeper collector 洒水扫集机sprinkling filter 喷洒滤器sprinkling truck 洒水车
石油英语词汇(S6)--石油百科 ... sprinkler 洒水器；洒水车 sprinkling basin 喷水池 sprinkling filter 滴滤池.
(乘310 路公汽终点站下车即到) 洒水车系列功能说明: 洒水车(Sprinkling Truck)又称运水车、喷洒车、园林绿化洒水车、多功能洒水车、环卫洒水车等,用于路面洒水.

entry.def: If you sprinkle a thing with something such as a liquid or powder, you scatter the liquid or powder over it.

example.ex: Sprinkle the meat with salt and place  in the pan...
example.tran: 在肉上撒上盐，然后放进平底锅。

example.ex: At the festival, candles are blessed and sprinkled with holy water...
example.tran: 在节日里，要对蜡烛祝圣，并洒以圣水。

entry.def: If something is sprinkled with particular things, it has a few of them throughout it and they are far apart from each other.

example.ex: Unfortunately, the text is sprinkled with errors...
example.tran: 遗憾的是，文本中零星地有一些错误。

example.ex: Men in green army uniforms are sprinkled throughout the huge auditorium.
example.tran: 穿着绿色军服的人星星点点地分布在整个大礼堂中。

entry.def: If it is sprinkling, it is raining very lightly.
